steps: In a bowl, add the granulated sugar with the yellow sugar with the butter at room temperature, beat until you get a cream.
Now add the whole egg, a yolk, vanilla extract, a tablespoon of milk and beat again until everything is incorporated.
Finally add the flour, yeast, chocolate and a pinch of salt, all sifted into the mixture, uses a wooden spoon to help create the dough.

Now grind the chocolate and add this dough, mix, now cut a rectangle of cling film and pour a little dough, with the help of the film create a thin roll of dough, then wrap in the film and tie the ends, take to the freezer, repeat until you roll the whole dough, in my case it was 2 large rolls and 1 small.

foodsCategories.title: Fruit Salad

foodsCategories.description: Fruit salad is always a simple and practical recipe, ideal for children to eat fruit but also to try fruit combinations, so this recipe is more a combination of the fruits that I like in a fast and delicious fruit salad with my favorite fruits, but can and should do your experiences, this recipe turns out to be another guide with some good tips to make good fruit salads.
steps: Choose fruit that is ripe and sweet, cut into large cubes if the fruit is large, pour a little lemon juice to prevent rusting.
Put at least 30minutes in the fridge to stay fresh, a fruit salad tastes best fresh, a fruit salad is to be consumed on the day it is made!
If you think the fruit combination is not ripe or sweet, pour some sugar or honey to sweeten, or if you use fruit in syrup a little syrup.

Just as a salad shouldn't have too many ingredients, also a fruit salad is ideal when you only have a few fruits, 4 or 5 is ideal, more than that and you start masking flavors and have a better chance of creating combinations that just don't work out well.
It avoids fruit too soft or that in contact with moisture becomes soft, such as bananas, this creates a strange texture when eating.
A fruit salad can be accompanied with a thousand and one things, from yogurt, cereals, dried fruits, etc.

foodsCategories.title: Pizza Calabreza

foodsCategories.description: To follow this our recipe of Pizza de Calabresa will just take an hour of your time at home and put your hand in the dough.  In this article you will see how simple and easy it is to prepare your delicious Calabrian Pizza even if you are a beginner in the kitchen. So let's start the ingredients.
steps: Beat the tomato in the blender with the other ingredients until it forms a homogeneous mixture.
Mix 50 gr of flour, yeast and a little water. Let sit for up to 20 minutes. Add the other ingredients and smasit until you get a very soft dough.
Cut into 3 equal parts, form 3 balls and cover them with a cloth. Let it sit for 1 hour. Open the dough with a roll until it is 25 cm in size.
Spread the tomato sauce on top and bake in a preheated oven at 180ºC, or for 15 minutes. Remove and allow to cool.
Spread the sausage over the tomato sauce and top with the onion. Garnish with the olive and place the olive oil and oregano.
Return to the oven for another 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and ready, you can now use your Calabrian Pizza made right there in your home.

You can also spice up the recipe by adding tomato slices sprinkled with salt and black pepper to taste. If you prefer add oregano as well.
The cheese suggested in this recipe is the dish, but you can use the one of your choice and even exchange the simple ham for another type that you like the most.
